CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Adds falling objects that morph into the ceiling and floor.
CONTROLS.NAME: droppers

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Add cylinders that cut through the room and out into the sky above.
CONTROLS.NAME: cylinders

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Jumps when it detects a beat.
CONTROLS.NAME: beat_twitching

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Lights in certain ridges flash on drum hits.
CONTROLS.NAME: flashing

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Removes the walls and ceiling to reveal full sky. Warning: This plus cylinders or droppers can get very laggy!
CONTROLS.NAME: astral_plane

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Render the scene in 3D-pixels for a low-fi look.
CONTROLS.NAME: voxelate

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Increase to make the voxelation effect much more pronounced, with larger voxels.
CONTROLS.NAME: voxel_size

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: If manual_camera is on, use this XY to look around.
CONTROLS.NAME: camera_look

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Camera automatically rotates around the room, but turn this on to take manual control.
CONTROLS.NAME: manual_camera

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Instead of the default color scheme, turning this up lets you select slight variations.
CONTROLS.NAME: color_mod

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Once color_mod is all the way up, select from one of 6 color schemes here.
CONTROLS.NAME: palette_select
